name: FINAL GIRL
description:
Band camp has been the absolute worst! That b****h Jessica Slurpe kissed Jason, when she *knew* that you liked him!

Also, it turns out the camp counsellors are cultists that sacrificed all your friends to a demon lord, and now they're hunting for you.

Can you survive until your parents pick you up?

*****

This game was made for the notice me game jam over on Opera GXC, knocked it together in about 10 days. 

Please enjoy :)

*****
